description: Barberry (Berberis 'Cally Rose') is an amazing ornamental shrub known for its beautiful pink and white spring flowers and purple-black autumnal berries. Growing up to 1.5 meters tall, this fast-growing shrub is great for use as a hedge, for ground covering, as well as perking up any garden space with its vibrant colors and foliage. In addition, its evergreen foliage provides welcome bright green all year, while being low maintenance and disease resistant. This hardy and versatile species is a must-have for any garden.
